children.summary: Gets the trait values associated with this test class (and the test collection, and test assembly). If there are none, or the framework does not support traits, this returns an empty dictionary (not null).

content.value: public string UniqueID { get; }
Public ReadOnly Property UniqueID As String

children.remarks: The unique identifier for a test class should be able to discriminate among test classes in the same test assembly. This identifier should remain stable until such time as the developer changes some fundamental part of the identity (assembly, collection, or test class). Recompilation of the test assembly is reasonable as a stability changing event.
children.summary: Gets the unique ID for this test class.

summary: Default implementation of for xUnit v3 tests based on reflection.
